text: 1.4: Zo 15.16; 17.24; Ro 8.28; Ef 5.27; Kor 1.22; 2 Te 2.13; 2 T 1.9; Ze 2.5; 1 Pi 2.20Fhe Bakɨme zumgum kha nuiana muuŋgi. Ana fhumra nzan Krais phorgɨ kɨr zav nzan fararav nzan wora mbuigi, nza ŋgaravra kɨrga. Nza tɨvir vhuuiaŋ mbui gumgi gu mbigi kɨv, nza ana nɨman bigɨn thueŋ suaŋv simtɨk kɨrga fhu.
